task.title: Configure the node
task.shortdesc: After you rack and cable the hardware, you are ready to configure your new storage resource.

taskbody.prereq: You have powered on the node.

step.cmd: Attach a keyboard and monitor to the node.
In the terminal user interface (TUI) that is displayed, configure the network and cluster settings for the node by using the on-screen navigation.

info.note: You must get the IP address of the node from the TUI. You need this when you add the node to a cluster. After you save the settings, the node is in a pending state, and can be added to a cluster. See the NetApp Element Software Setup Guide for configuration instructions.

step.cmd: Configure out-of-band management using the Baseboard Management Controller (BMC).
step.info: This steps applies only to H610S nodes.
